title: Kids Dinosaur Game-Dino Puzzle
summary:
Your child want to explore the prehistoric park and discover dinosaur species ?
you have found the right educational game !

This app is a challenging and fun way to develop fine motor skills, visual perception and hand-eye coordination.

Dinosaur Games for Toddlers : prehistoric park puzzles ! is simple and fun :

You dig for dinosaur bones by rubbing the screen on the marked spots. While digging, you find dinosaur bones and random items, and when you have found all the bones, the dinosaur comes alive!

As you play the game all dinos and items that you find are collected in two separate galleries.

title: Baby Animals Game & Kid Phone
summary:
Baby Games for One Year Old is Family Fun For All! Baby Games for Boys and Girls

This is baby games with full features.

Educational music baby games for babies, children of all ages and all the family. This fun music game will entertain your baby, kids, toddlers and the entire family for hours on end with classic American nursery rhymes.

Baby Animals Game - a collection of fun toddler games to entertain and keep your baby happy. Ideal for a one year old or a two year old babies and infants.
Includes the following fun Baby Games:

* Animal Sounds
* Baby Phone
* ABC's
* 123's
* Baby Keyboard
* Learning about Colors
* Shapes
* Dress the baby!
* Animal Zoo
* Baby Paint

* Musical phone that plays piano sounds when numbered keys are touched and makes musical calls 
* Tons of musical games for hours of enjoyment  

Lots of pre-bundled Nursery Rhymes that simulate calls  

* Wheels on the bus
* Five little ducks
* If you are happy
* Old Macdonald
* Row row your boat
* Grand old duke
* I'm a little teapot
* London bridge
and many more


You and your child will love these educational baby games. Includes animals buttons that children can touch to hear the sound they make. Animal sounds include cat, dog, farm animals, zoo animals.

Plays Nursery Rhymes, Lullabies, Songs and lots of Sound Effects that your kid will love playing.


This is one of the most fun baby games for a six month old to one year old to 2 year old baby. Also ideal for Toddlers who will still appreciate and sing along to the music and nursery rhymes.


With this Smart Games: Baby Animals Game & Kid Phone, your children will love bobbing to the nursery rhymes and making sound effects. Give these great American baby games a try. You won't regret it.
Download now and play with your kids.

If you enjoy our games or there are any feedback, please send us via email: harryjury@gmail.com

title: Dino Kid Puzzle for Baby Games
summary:
A wonderful, cute collection of puzzles and dinosaur for toddlers and kids.

Try out this fun educational learning app with your children. Your baby will recognize different shapes and will enjoy playing with colorful pieces. This is the classic children's puzzle so it is quite educational for preschool and kindergarten kids.

This game will help your baby develop thinking, tactile and fine motor skills. Notice how they learn car, transportation means, vehicles and airplanes while playing. Babies and toddlers can have fun playing for a long time.

It is an easy game for toddlers as it does not have menus or unnecessary options that can confuse kids. It is about placing the shape that appears at the bottom of the screen on the space provided for it. Once the piece and the shape are matched, the child will see an animation of reward that will serve as motivation to continue playing.

This is great game for who loving dinosaur, download now and play with your kids.

If you enjoy our games or there are any feedback, please send us via email: harryjury@gmail.com

title: Classic Solitaire 98
summary:
Solitaire is classic exciting game. We’re ALWAYS updating our Solitaire to include fun new features! If you like PC Solitaire, you're going to LOVE this app!! The familiar PC Solitaire game you used to play on your computer is now available on the mobile!

Haven't won in a while? The Winning Deals feature creates a game that deals hands guaranteed to have at least one winning solution. Use "Hint" to help walk you through the moves required to win the deal if you still need a hand.

The addicting game you’ve been playing on your computer for years now goes wherever you do. Solitaire is a universal app, playable in the best resolution available for each Android device. Download Solitaire today!

FEATURES:
-Theme Packs
-Winning Deals
-Hint
-Draw 1 card
-Draw 3 cards
-Modern Card Fonts
-Custom card backs
-Custom backgrounds
-Right or left handed play
-Game state saved when interrupted
-Unlimited undo
-Standard scoring
-Vegas scoring
-Statistics

title: Now Pokeca
summary:
NowPokeca(トレカ入荷)の特徴
人気トレカ・人気商品の販売状況を365日・24時間体制で監視し、各ショップの公式販売開始（予約開始）と同時にプッシュ通知を配信します。

新製品の追加は順次行い、公式サイト・公式Twitterにてお知らせいたします。
また、商品追加のご要望も随時受け付けております。

■ご注意
・本アプリはプッシュ通知を使用するため、プッシュ通知の受け取りをONにしてください。
・本アプリは個人が開発するショッピング支援アプリです。

title: Flashcard Japanese beginner
summary:
Flashcards is an easy to use flashcard app which you can use to start study Japanese

Features:

• Several flashcard themes to choose from (animals, tree, fruits, etc.)
• Divide cards into categories
• Include pictures and sounds.
• Easy navigation - swipe or tap to next/back
• Very easy to get started
• Great support! I promptly respond to any questions or feedback you may have. Use my website's public forum or email me.
